meanings.definition: The outer layer of the skull.
meanings.sent3: The epicranium seemed to be the helmet of the head.
meanings.sent4: His epicranium was as tough as a shield.
meanings.sent5: The epicranium is like a sturdy roof for the skull.

meanings.definition: The top part of the head.
meanings.sent1: Her epicranium was adorned with a colorful bow.
meanings.sent2: He felt a slight breeze on his epicranium.
meanings.sent3: The epicranium looked like a crown on her head.
meanings.sent4: The epicranium gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The epicranium is the highest point of the head.

meanings.sent2: He wore a hat to protect his epicranium.
meanings.sent3: The epicranium is like a cozy blanket for the head.
meanings.sent4: Her epicranium was hidden under a stylish cap.
meanings.sent5: The epicranium is the natural armor of the cranium.
